other_title: 勇者特急マイトガイン (Japanese)
plot: Senpūji Maito is a billionaire crime fighting teenager, taking up his father's company and assets at the age of only 15. Taking control of the Might Gaine team of robots that his late father created, Senpūji and his free thinking robot teams take on the crime lords that plague Neo Tokyo City.
opening_theme: "嵐の勇者[ヒーロー] (Arashi no Hero)" by Yuzuru Oka
ending_theme: "危険なゴールド (Kiken na Gold)" by Marie Cochrane (eps 1-26)
"嵐の勇者[ヒーロー] (Arashi no Hero)" by Yuzuru Oka (ep 47)
insert_song: "Great Dash!" by Itai Toshi & Takao Naoki
